trans-unit.source: Defines a condition with an associated set of actions to perform.
trans-unit.target: Define uma condição com um conjunto associado de ações a serem executadas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> consists of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> and one or both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> consiste em uma <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> e uma ou ambas as <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> coleções.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a named <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um conjunto nomeado <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> class using the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> usando o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> objects to evaluate whether the condition is true.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> para avaliar se a condição é verdadeira.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> class using the name of the <see langword="Rule" />, the rule condition, and a list of THEN actions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> usando o nome do <see langword="Rule" />, a condição de regra e uma lista de ações THEN.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> objects to evaluate if the condition is true.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> para avaliar se a condição é verdadeira.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> objects to evaluate whether the condition is false.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> para avaliar se a condição é falsa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> class using the name of the <see langword="Rule" />, the rule condition, a list of THEN actions, and a list of ELSE actions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> usando o nome do <see langword="Rule" />, a condição de regra, uma lista de ações THEN e uma lista de ações ELSE.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> should be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> deve ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Rule should be evaluated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a regra deve ser avaliada; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, this property is similar to commenting out the rule.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido como `false`, esta propriedade é semelhante ao comentar a regra.

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é `true`.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia em profundidade do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> que é idêntico a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> a ser avaliado pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma descrição do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: A description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> classes to perform in the ELSE case.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de classes <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> para executar no caso de ELSE.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> to perform in the ELSE case.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> para executar no caso de ELSE.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, calls a method of the activity, or calls static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> normalmente definido um valor de variável em uma das propriedades da atividade, chama um método de atividade ou chama métodos estáticos em tipos em assemblies referenciados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> para interromper a execução e retorna o controle para o método de chamada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifica uma propriedade ou chama um método.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitamente indica que uma regra está atualizando uma variável.

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que a reavaliação de quaisquer regras afetadas.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the current object to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o qual comparar o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> and the object passed as the parameter have the same value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se essa instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> e o objeto passado como o parâmetro têm o mesmo valor.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current object and <paramref name="obj" /> are the same; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto atual e <paramref name="obj" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in which a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> should be run.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem na qual um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> deve ser executado.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order in which a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> should be run.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem na qual um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> deve ser executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes that have a higher priority value are run before lower priority <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> as classes que têm um valor de prioridade mais alto são executadas antes de prioridade mais baixa <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes.

trans-unit.source: Rules that have the same priority are run in the alphabetic order of their name properties.
trans-unit.target: As regras que têm a mesma prioridade são executadas na ordem alfabética de suas propriedades name.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Priority%2A> value can be positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Priority%2A> valor pode ser positivo ou negativo.

trans-unit.source: The default value for any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão para qualquer <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> pode ser reavaliado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior" /> indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior" /> que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> pode ser reavaliado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> classes to perform in the THEN case.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de classes <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> para executar no caso de THEN.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> classes to perform in the THEN case.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> classes para executar no caso de, em seguida.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> normalmente define um valor de variável em uma das propriedades da atividade, chamar um método de atividade ou chamar métodos estáticos em tipos em assemblies referenciados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> para interromper a execução e retorna o controle para o método de chamada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitamente indica que uma regra está atualizando uma variável.

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que a reavaliação de quaisquer regras afetadas.
